name: Boutique Hotel Golf Course Overlooking the Pyrenees
description:
DESCRIPTION
Situated in the heart of the Pyrenees mountains and right in front of one of its highest peak (9000'), you will be delighted by the natural beauty of the site. Our boutique hotel with its 24 suites**** can sleep up to 65. Many hotels, B&B's, and even camp sites close by will accomodate your guests if necessary. Our 18 hole golf course is on your doorstep and other outdoor activities are right on site. Our marquees can accomodate up to 300 guests and we can cater your event.
This beautiful boutique hotel, with its excellent restaurant, offers fully-inclusive wedding packages to couples looking for a truly unique setting for their perfect celebration.
Relax in the comfort of the hotel's numerous one and two bedroom suites - simple, stylish and contemporary. Take a moment to sit on your private terrace, entranced by the wonderful views of the mountains, glowing in sunlight.
A lovely venue for all weddings - but if you're a golfer, then it really is the dream location!
